txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Great ears from the beasts in the eastern reaches of the Misty Mountains. You can deliver these items to Afwald within the ruins at Hrimbarg in the Misty Mountains.
'Supplies are supplies at the moment, thank you.'
'If you happen upon any beasts around here, we could use their fur, skins, and ears. I'd go myself, but my duties hold me fast to Hrimbarg.'
Afwald, the provisioner at the dwarf-ruin of Hrimbarg, awaits the return of great ears.
Deliver the great ears to Afwald within the ruins of Hrimbarg in the Misty Mountains

You have accepted a task to deliver great ears from the beasts found in the eastern reaches of the Misty Mountains to Afwald. Afwald can be found within the ruins at Hrimbarg, also found in the Misty Mountains.
Wanted: Great ears from the beasts in the eastern reaches of the Misty Mountains.
